ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Some faces on that Day will be radiant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Many faces will be joyous on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On that very Day some faces shall be radiant with joy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, on that day the faces of other people will be happy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Many a face will be in serenity on that day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Faces that Day will be joyful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (Other) faces on that day shall be happy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: In that day other faces will be calm,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Some faces on that Day will be radiant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Faces on that Day shall be de lighted,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Some faces on that day will be joyous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Other) faces that Day will be joyful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Other) faces, that Day, will be joyful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Whereas other) faces on that Day will be joyful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Faces on that Day will be joyful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:8] Other faces on that day will be delicate, fair,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (In that day other faces) the faces of true believers (will be calm) beautiful and radiant,
